title: Twiplies
text:
Tests

import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv()

robot1 = Twiplies(
    username="joaopcnogueira",
    consumer_key=os.getenv("CONSUMER_KEY"),
    consumer_secret=os.getenv("CONSUMER_SECRET"),
    access_token=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN"),
    access_token_secret=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET")
)

robot2 = Twiplies(
    username="joaopcnogueira",
    consumer_key=os.getenv("CONSUMER_KEY"),
    consumer_secret=os.getenv("CONSUMER_SECRET"),
    access_token=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN"),
    access_token_secret=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET")
)

robot3 = Twiplies(
    username="mamede86",
    consumer_key=os.getenv("CONSUMER_KEY"),
    consumer_secret=os.getenv("CONSUMER_SECRET"),
    access_token=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN"),
    access_token_secret=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET")
)


test_eq(robot1, robot2)


test_ne(robot1, robot3)


test_ne(robot2, robot3)



How to Use
Example on how to use twiplies:

from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv()

robot = Twiplies(
    username="joaopcnogueira",
    consumer_key=os.getenv("CONSUMER_KEY"),
    consumer_secret=os.getenv("CONSUMER_SECRET"),
    access_token=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN"),
    access_token_secret=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET")
)


robot

Twiplies(username='joaopcnogueira')



robot.get_replies_from_tweet(tweet_id='1552109783393751042', n_tweets=100)

      Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

title: IO Tools
text:
build_dataframe (tweet_ids:List, replies:List)

Build a dataframe with each tweetâ€™s replies for line.

title: Getting Started
text:
How to use

from twiplies.core import Twiplies


import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv()

robot = Twiplies(
    username="joaopcnogueira",
    consumer_key=os.getenv("CONSUMER_KEY"),
    consumer_secret=os.getenv("CONSUMER_SECRET"),
    access_token=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN"),
    access_token_secret=os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET")
)


robot

Twiplies(username='joaopcnogueira')


Get tweetâ€™s replies from a specific tweet_id:

robot.get_replies_from_tweet(tweet_id='1552109783393751042', n_tweets=100)





  
    
      
      tweet_original
      tweet_replies
      tweet_user
      tweet_location
    
  
  
    
      0
      1552109783393751042
      @joaopcnogueira Sim! O carregador nÃ£o posso ma...
      annppn
      Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
    
  




Get tweetâ€™s replies from all twitters from an user:

robot.get_all_replies(n_tweets=1000)
